examples.korean: However, in the current drama that deals with a romance between a female teacher and a student, that is rarely seen in real life, and no probability or inevitability can be found,' said Bae Kuk-nam, a culture critic. Bae says that with some comical elements and stars, the drama's content is on the superficial level. 'How will high school students in reality view romances between characters of their same age and female teachers who are carefree from the difficulties that students face every day in real life?' said a female teacher from a high school in Seoul. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그러나, 여선생님과 학생의 로맨스를 다루는 현재의 드라마들은 현실에서 거의 볼 수 없고, 따라서 개연성이나 필연성이 없습니다,'라고 문화평론가 배국남은 말했다. 그는 일부 코믹한 요소들과 스타들로 드라마의 내용이 피상적인 수위에 달했다고 말한다. '줄거리가 현실과 너무 동떨어진 주제들을 다룬다면, 결국 시청자들은 그 드라마들을 부인할 것입니다.' Neungyule
examples.english: However, in the current drama that deals with a romance between a female teacher and a student, that is rarely seen in real life, and no probability or inevitability can be found,' said Bae Kuk-nam, a culture critic. Bae says that with some comical elements and stars, the drama's content is on the superficial level. 'How will high school students in reality view romances between characters of their same age and female teachers who are carefree from the difficulties that students face every day in real life?' said a female teacher from a high school in Seoul.
